Text: Re Panda Florida Projects Term Sheet and Letter Of Intenttwo documents look good Will you prepare the two documents for signature thank JG
Re Panda projects Enfolio Agreementgreat Call me when they are ready Thanks JG

RE Pooling Point Purchase GTCNonPrivilegedpst Gerald I have reviewed the agreements I have only one question concerning Variance From Nomination If the producer under delivers and I have to replace the gas should we use a keep whole I am not sure if this concern is covered under Quantity Obligation Please let me know your thoughts thanks JJG Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Thursday August AM To Grass John Cc Wallumrod Ellen Thorne Judy Subject Pooling Point Purchase GTC Attached is the form of pooling point purchase GTC for ENA Upstream This form still needs further refinements but for August business I am comfortable to use However John please specifically review the nomination variance language in the confirm Upon your approval Ellen can move forward with August use Let me know if you have any questions File ENAUpstreamConfirm PoolPointdoc File PoolGTCDOC

RE WT Offshore and Spinnaker Cc NonPrivilegedpst Nelson can we look at a Master with this customer Please let me know your thoughts on this issue for WT and other producers we buy from every month Original Message From Wallumrod Ellen Sent Friday August PM To Thorne Judy Nemec Gerald Cc Ferries Nelson Grass John Subject RE WT Offshore and Spinnaker How about doing a Master of some sort with them Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Friday August PM To Nemec Gerald Wallumrod Ellen Cc Ferries Nelson Grass John Subject WT Offshore and Spinnaker Gerald After talking with Nelson Ferries about two of his counterparties I have found that the standard ToleranceKeep Whole language that is now in our ENA Upstream confimation will not cover the negotiated Keep Whole for these counterparties Nelson has negotiated a Keep Whole arrangement that takes effect whether the counterparty notifies us or not The tolerance for their swing is and the pricing is based on Gas Daily Mid He has worded the Keep Whole on his deal tickets as follows Volumes deliverd in excess of of the FOM nom shall be prived at the applicable Gas Daily Report Midpoint price Volumes delivered below of the FOM nom shall be kept whole at the applicable Gas Daily Midpoint up to the agreed tolerance level of These deals are monthly deals that are done every month and will need this language in them every month Please let me know how you would like to handle including of this special language in the confirmations Thanks Judy

FW Wellhead Master Cc NonPrivilegedpst I would like you to attend Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday September AM To Thorne Judy Cc Wallumrod Ellen Grass John Subject RE Wellhead Master Lets discuss on Thursday Original Message From Thorne Judy Sent Monday September AM To Nemec Gerald Cc Grass John Wallumrod Ellen Ferries Nelson Subject Wellhead Master Gerald The Upstream group is doing a considerable amount of repeat business with several customers There is an increasing need to execute Master agreements with these customers We would like to begin the development of a Master Wellhead contract that includes the same type of provisions that our Upstream GTC contracts include such as tolerances keep whole nomination deadlines etc Can you please let me know if you see any issues with changing the Master Firm contract to accomodate the Upstream business or if there is anything else that you may need from us to begin creating this Upstream Master Thanks Judy

ISDAand Veronica Please review the following documents The contact person listed in the intro letter is Janet Owens Corporate Risk Manager and my contact is Greg Davis VP of Trading Equitable Energy LLC I will be out of the office until June but will be checking my voice mail Let me know what you think Forwarded by John GrassCorpEnron on PM on PM To cc Subject ISDA ISDASectLetterdoc ISDAStandarddoc ISDASchASectrdoc ISDASectLetterdoc ISDAStandarddoc ISDASchASectrdoc
